sentences.en: A numerical study on the floristics of the Zhoushan Archipelago.
sentences.cn: 舟山群岛植物区系地理的数值研究.

sentences.en: A school of fish clusters near a reef in French Polynesia's Tuamotu Archipelago.
sentences.cn: 在法国玻利尼西亚南太平洋阿莫土群岛的暗礁旁边,许多鱼聚集成群.

sentences.en: A scorpion fish attempts to hide in the sand in French Polynesia's Tuamotu Archipelago.
sentences.cn: 在波利尼西亚土阿莫土群岛生活的天蝎鱼把自己隐藏在沙子内.

sentences.en: Arrives islands successively and so on Bahamian archipelago, Cuba, Haiti, Dominica, Trinidad.
sentences.cn: 先后到达巴哈马群岛 、 古巴 、 海地 、 多米尼加 、 特立尼达等岛.

sentences.en: Copperfield insists his archipelago also contains the legendary waters that bestow perpetual youth.
sentences.cn: 科波菲尔坚称,他的群岛上有那种可以让人青春永驻的传说中的“不老泉”.

sentences.en: It abuts the Tropic of Cancer, constituted the Polynesia archipelago north vanguard.
sentences.cn: 它紧靠北回归线, 构成了波利尼西亚群岛的北方前锋.

sentences.en: It is under investigation at Port Blair , the main administrative center of the archipelago.
sentences.cn: 该船现在破布莱尔港接受调查, 此港是整个离岛的中心.

sentences.en: Means big bonfires all over in the archipelago.
sentences.cn: 这意味著群岛将遍布巨大的篝火.

sentences.en: Neville: but there are about 24,000 islands in the Stockholm archipelago.
sentences.cn: 奈维尔: 但大约有二万四千个岛在斯德哥尔摩群岛.

sentences.en: Neville: Yes. There are about 24,000 islands in the Stockholm archipelago.
sentences.cn: 奈维尔: 是的.大约有二万四千个岛.在斯德哥尔摩群岛.

sentences.en: Putuo Mountain lies to the east of Zhoushan Archipelago.
sentences.cn: 旁白:普陀山位于舟山群岛的东部.

sentences.en: That happened when the Big Board combined with the electronic trading exchange Archipelago Holdings.
sentences.cn: 那事情发生在纽约股票交易所将电子交易和群岛股份组合时.

sentences.en: The archipelago continues for another 500 miles.
sentences.cn: 这个群岛又绵延了500英里.

sentences.en: The Encyclopedia of the Chinese Overseas Lynn Pan ( General Editor ) , Archipelago Press Landmark Books , Singapore.
sentences.cn: 《华人华侨百科全书》,周南京, 中国华侨出版社.

sentences.en: The rich life of Svalbard, Norway's Arctic archipelago, faces a creeping thaw.
sentences.cn: 生物资源丰富的斯瓦尔巴德群岛, 挪威的北极群岛, 面临逐渐解冻的危机.
